page.title: 13LONG CLOSE
page.content: Around 1800 a huge house was built called "Long Close".The owner of the house travelled abroad a lot.He brought specimen trees.He planted the trees around his estate.Around the 1900's the house was made into a Prep School called "Long Close School",in 1950 the school was moved to Slough.A pupil in our class used to attend the new Long Close School in Slough. In 1960 new houses were built on the site of the old School because it had to be pulled down.All the trees preservation orders put on them.So the builders had to work around them,though a few trees were Knocked down "accidentally" on purpose. We spoke to a lady who lives in "Long Close".In her front garden is a giant wellingtonia tree,a cousin of the Giant red wood tree.It has grown to a huge size,but she can't cut it down.
